channel.title: I cant download game from my country
channel.description: my country is banned to download this game why?

item.title: I cant download game from my country
item.dc:creator: Keresh
item.description:
Oh yeah, because the fact that someone on the internet told you it’s not a virus automatically makes it safe. You’ve made two threads asking the same question, don’t do that again please. This thread is for asking questions. Even the silly ones.

Read full topic
item.source: I cant download game from my country

item.title: I cant download game from my country
item.dc:creator: dr.freeman101
item.description:
I was just asking if was a hack or not because i just dident wanted my computer to be hacked and all… Since you said its not a hack im gonna go and download it. thanks for the help.

Read full topic
item.source: I cant download game from my country

item.title: I cant download game from my country
item.dc:creator: Dominus_Tempus
item.description:
dr.freeman101:

Is black mesa like a hack/virus (just asking) because i dont want my computer to be hacked and all so… its black a hack/virus or not.

Uhh, no.

Lots of game executables have been known to get a false flag from antivirus programs, if that’s what you mean.

Forgive me, but that was a pretty damn stupid thing to ask. Why the hell would it be a virus?

Read full topic

Gamefront might as well just shut down because it seems to have blacklisted 90% of the planet.

Sorry this too long lost is the white list

but see… there are banned countries (those no in list)

and a portal to download mods and open source games, should be open for all world!

item.dc:creator: leo3487
item.description:
danielsangeo:

The American government has nothing to do with this mod. You can download it from multiple places. If anyone is blocking it, it’s your country or your ISP.

in fact Im downloading it, via torrent. Then is not my ISP

Is game front
